object.name: Update
object.description:
This object represents an incoming update.
At most one of the optional parameters can be present in any given update.
object.html_description:
This object represents an incoming update.
At most one of the optional parameters can be present in any given update.
object.rst_description:
This `object <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#available-types>`_ represents an incoming update.

At most **one** of the optional parameters can be present in any given update.

annotations.description: The update's unique identifier. Update identifiers start from a certain positive number and increase sequentially. This ID becomes especially handy if you're using webhooks, since it allows you to ignore repeated updates or to restore the correct update sequence, should they get out of order. If there are no new updates for at least a week, then identifier of the next update will be chosen randomly instead of sequentially.
annotations.html_description: The update's unique identifier. Update identifiers start from a certain positive number and increase sequentially. This ID becomes especially handy if you're using webhooks, since it allows you to ignore repeated updates or to restore the correct update sequence, should they get out of order. If there are no new updates for at least a week, then identifier of the next update will be chosen randomly instead of sequentially.
annotations.rst_description: The update's unique identifier. Update identifiers start from a certain positive number and increase sequentially. This ID becomes especially handy if you're using `webhooks <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#setwebhook>`_, since it allows you to ignore repeated updates or to restore the correct update sequence, should they get out of order. If there are no new updates for at least a week, then identifier of the next update will be chosen randomly instead of sequentially.
annotations.name: update_id

annotations.description: New incoming message of any kind - text, photo, sticker, etc.
annotations.html_description: Optional. New incoming message of any kind - text, photo, sticker, etc.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. New incoming message of any kind - text, photo, sticker, etc.
annotations.name: message

annotations.description: New version of a message that is known to the bot and was edited
annotations.html_description: Optional. New version of a message that is known to the bot and was edited
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. New version of a message that is known to the bot and was edited
annotations.name: edited_message

annotations.description: New incoming channel post of any kind - text, photo, sticker, etc.
annotations.html_description: Optional. New incoming channel post of any kind - text, photo, sticker, etc.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. New incoming channel post of any kind - text, photo, sticker, etc.
annotations.name: channel_post

annotations.description: New version of a channel post that is known to the bot and was edited
annotations.html_description: Optional. New version of a channel post that is known to the bot and was edited
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. New version of a channel post that is known to the bot and was edited
annotations.name: edited_channel_post

annotations.description: The result of an inline query that was chosen by a user and sent to their chat partner. Please see our documentation on the feedback collecting for details on how to enable these updates for your bot.
annotations.html_description: Optional. The result of an inline query that was chosen by a user and sent to their chat partner. Please see our documentation on the feedback collecting for details on how to enable these updates for your bot.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The result of an `inline <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#inline-mode>`_ query that was chosen by a user and sent to their chat partner. Please see our documentation on the `feedback collecting <https://core.telegram.org/bots/inline#collecting-feedback>`_ for details on how to enable these updates for your bot.
annotations.name: chosen_inline_result

annotations.description: New incoming shipping query. Only for invoices with flexible price
annotations.html_description: Optional. New incoming shipping query. Only for invoices with flexible price
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. New incoming shipping query. Only for invoices with flexible price
annotations.name: shipping_query

annotations.description: New incoming pre-checkout query. Contains full information about checkout
annotations.html_description: Optional. New incoming pre-checkout query. Contains full information about checkout
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. New incoming pre-checkout query. Contains full information about checkout
annotations.name: pre_checkout_query

annotations.description: New poll state. Bots receive only updates about stopped polls and polls, which are sent by the bot
annotations.html_description: Optional. New poll state. Bots receive only updates about stopped polls and polls, which are sent by the bot
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. New poll state. Bots receive only updates about stopped polls and polls, which are sent by the bot
annotations.name: poll

annotations.description: A user changed their answer in a non-anonymous poll. Bots receive new votes only in polls that were sent by the bot itself.
annotations.html_description: Optional. A user changed their answer in a non-anonymous poll. Bots receive new votes only in polls that were sent by the bot itself.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. A user changed their answer in a non-anonymous poll. Bots receive new votes only in polls that were sent by the bot itself.
annotations.name: poll_answer

annotations.description: The bot's chat member status was updated in a chat. For private chats, this update is received only when the bot is blocked or unblocked by the user.
annotations.html_description: Optional. The bot's chat member status was updated in a chat. For private chats, this update is received only when the bot is blocked or unblocked by the user.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The bot's chat member status was updated in a chat. For private chats, this update is received only when the bot is blocked or unblocked by the user.
annotations.name: my_chat_member

annotations.description: A chat member's status was updated in a chat. The bot must be an administrator in the chat and must explicitly specify 'chat_member' in the list of allowed_updates to receive these updates.
annotations.html_description: Optional. A chat member's status was updated in a chat. The bot must be an administrator in the chat and must explicitly specify “chat_member” in the list of allowed_updates to receive these updates.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. A chat member's status was updated in a chat. The bot must be an administrator in the chat and must explicitly specify 'chat_member' in the list of *allowed_updates* to receive these updates.
annotations.name: chat_member

annotations.description: A request to join the chat has been sent. The bot must have the can_invite_users administrator right in the chat to receive these updates.
annotations.html_description: Optional. A request to join the chat has been sent. The bot must have the can_invite_users administrator right in the chat to receive these updates.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. A request to join the chat has been sent. The bot must have the *can_invite_users* administrator right in the chat to receive these updates.
annotations.name: chat_join_request
